text: Torben Blech (born 12 February 1995) is a German pole vaulter and former decathlete. He won a silver medal at the 2019 Summer Universiade. His personal bests in the pole vault are 5.80 metres outdoors (Leverkusen 2019) and 5.55 metres indoors (Chemnitz 2019). ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |2017 |European U23 Championships |Bydgoszcz, Poland |9th |Decathlon |7675 pts |- |rowspan=2|2019 |Universiade |Naples, Italy |bgcolor=silver|2nd |Pole vault |5.76 m |- |World Championships |Doha, Qatar |23rd (q) |Pole vault |5.45 m |} ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:German male pole vaulters Category:German decathletes Category:Universiade silver medalists for Germany Category:Universiade medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Medalists at the 2019 Summer Universiade
title: Torben Blech
